About the Company: Frontline Corporation Limited engages in the transportation, trading, manufacturing, immovable property rental, and wind power generation businesses in India. The company provides logistic support by hiring trucks and deploying its own trucks or vehicles. It also engages in the distribution of auto components and farm equipment. In addition, the company engages in the manufacture of refractories bricks, including fireclay; and grog and alumina refractories for steel plants, cement kilns, glass furnaces,.The company also in the business activities of Wind Energy, Transportation, Trading and Manufacturing, Renting of Immovable Properties.
